turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I'm trying to figure out why my checking account balance is lower than I expected. I thought I had more money in there.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I can help with that. To start, can you please verify the last four digits of your account number and the last four digits of your social security number?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's 1234 and 5678. I just don't understand. I haven't made any large purchases recently. It's really frustrating.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. One moment while I access your account information. Okay, I see a recent transaction for $75 to 'Online Gaming Platform' on the 15th. Does that seem right?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, that must be my son. Is there any way to put a hold on future transactions to that company? And is there a way to limit his spending on my account? I need to prevent this from happening again.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, we can definitely assist you with that. Regarding blocking future transactions with 'Online Gaming Platform,' I will need to transfer you to our fraud department. They will be able to place a block on that specific vendor. For limiting your son's spending, you could consider opening a separate sub-account with a restricted debit card linked to it. This would allow you to control the funds he has access to. Would you like me to explore the sub-account option further or transfer you to the fraud department now?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Let's do the fraud department first. Thanks for your help!
